Articles.Content: Hi guys! Just wanted to say bye, because you won\'t be hearing from me for quite a while. At camp.

Try your best to have a good time there! Build a few bottle rockets or smth : )

See you!
*Salute* Stand ready, you may never know when zombies are coming. Also drink lots of water, from what I hear if you are in the US from the massive heatwave going across the nation.

Lol, guise. My camp kinda fails at being camp, because it\'s basically just a set of houses and activities. There are no tents or anything, and there\'s water fountains and air conditioning and stuff. So yeah, it\'s not camping, it\'s not camp where you have campfires (we can, but you really only do that ages 4-8), it just has a ton of really high-tech activities. Screw those tents, I\'m spoiled. 8)

Zombies?

Torch? Check.

Sunglasses? A-ok.

Pet for company? Present.

Blunt instrument? Copy.

Hedge trimmer? Go flight.

All you need for zombie survival.

See you soon Ping.
